Posted By: LeaPlath (8/4/2012 5:12:40 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Exalted is a sorely underestimated mechanic. This card will see play in top end tourny decks in both Ravnica and current standard. Most people only see the 1/1 at the bottom of the card and aren't paying attention to it's synergy with cards like [sublime archangel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=sublime archangel) and [knight of glory](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=knight of glory). Entirely possible to swing for 16+ damage on turn 5 especially if you throw in [angelic destiny](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=angelic destiny) and with [Ajani, caller of the pride](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ajani, caller of the pride) you can pull off 30+ damage on turn 5. Not only that, but it has flying, i'm absolutely flaberghasted as to why this card is rated so low. 4.5/5
posts.html:
